competency_1.requirements_1: Do all requirements have Acceptance Criteria?
competency_1.requirements_2: Have at least 40% of Requirements been Risk Assessed (RRA) for Testing?

competency_2.requirements_1: Does Acceptance criteria include functional and non-functional test types?
competency_2.requirements_2: Have at least 75% of Requirements been Risk Assessed for Testing?

competency_3.requirements_1: Is functional testing planned in sprints more than out of sprint?
competency_3.requirements_2: Have all Requirements been Risk Assessed for Testing?

competency_1.testing_1: Has a Test Approach (Tribe) been completed & agreed with stakeholders?

competency_2.testing_1: Was at least 60% of testing done in Sprints?

competency_3.testing_1: Was at least 80% of testing done in Sprints?

competency_1.build_1: Is UT automated and triggered from build at least 30%?
competency_1.build_2: Is frequency of Builds at least fortnightly?

competency_2.build_1: Is UT automated and triggered from build more than 50%?
competency_2.build_2: Is frequency of Builds at least weekly?

competency_3.build_1: Is UT automated and triggered from build at least 90%?
competency_3.build_2: Is frequency of Builds at least daily?

competency_1.deploy_1: Is the frequency of Production deployments < 3 months?

competency_2.deploy_1: Is the frequency of Production deployments < 8 weeks?

competency_3.deploy_1: Is the frequency of Production deployments < 4 weeks?
